area_name: Flaring Chosswidth Tower - CLOSED TO CLIMBING!!

climbs.name: Flaring Chosswidth - PERMANENTLY CLOSED TO CLIMBING!!

content.description: Start (or better yet, turn around) on the S corner of this formation follow poorly protected crumbling face veering to the SE face and create a scary 'anchor' in a pod (80'). Make a difficult balancey smearing move to the right (right off the bad anchor) and continue up into a strenous flaring chimney to summit.
content.protection: nuts and aliens to whatever you got #4's and #5's are often smaller than you would like. Walk off the top.
content.location: This formation and route are obvious from 'where the banshees lie' on the Stonehenge formation.  It starts on the S corner of the formation.

pathTokens: Flaring Chosswidth Tower - CLOSED TO CLIMBING!!
